steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on div_object --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_planning --> navigate to Page_releases
step 5: At Page_releases click on div_object
step 6: At Page_releases click on hyperlink_team_project_releases
step 7: At Page_releases click on hyperlink_edit --> navigate to Page_edit
step 8: Add visual checkpoint at Page_edit
